If this game is an open-world game it would make it a lot better, and have more characters that make the world more interactive.

Rating: 8.5/10

Extra:
This game is really damn good. The story is interesting, the characters are good and the ending makes you sit in your chair for a minute and reflect on everything that happened in the game with your mouth wide open. I also really liked Elizabeth, even though her character itself wasn't very deep. I played through the game in two days, playing only the last Level in the second day. I think that says a lot about how invested I was in the story. The issue I have with this game is the game- and especially gunplay. Some guns are underpowered, and so are some vigors. Probably about 35% of the game I was running around with the machine gun and the shotgun, for  another 5% I would only use the sniper until my ammo ran out. This could also be the same problem as in a lot of similar games, like the other Bioshocks: you start to develop a playstyle and stick with it through the rest of the game. Proof of this is that my most used vigor by far is the first one you get, simply because it works well and you get no real reason to change your playstyle except for ammo. It took me about 9.5 hours (ignore the 13.5 hours, I started the game before but had gone on a vacation and forgot about it when I came back) to finish the game. I definetely recommend this one, but I wouldn't spend the standard price because of the lenght and the gunplay.

This game has the most beautiful graphics.Honestly I enjoyed the beginning of this game where you walk at the park.But after they found out that you were a false shepherd everything is messy.Let me collaborate on that.Beautiful graphics and gore(blood and killing) don't jibe with each other which is sickening.It is sickening to kill enemies in this beautiful world.I guess developers should have addded dark atmosphere(dark lights) to this game.
  Most of the game you just shoot endless army which in my opinion is boring.You shoot an entire army then little bit of story happens.Again you shoot an endless army then little bit of story happens.As I mentioned story is short but enemies are endless and boring and repetitive.In the beginning of the game you have clear objective to find a girl and take her to New York.But in the middle of the game story is so confusing which gives you no motivation to continue the game.But the conclusion to the story was ok at the end of the game.
    It was really a good game for its time good graphics and stuff.But I don't think it can hold up to 2020 gaming.It is just my opinion.Feel free to comment what did think about my review
